LIGURIAN SEA.
ITALY-NORTHWEST COAST.
1. WINDSURFER MISSING VICINITY GENOVA (44-23.9N 008-55.3E).
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
   A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 39 06 5908 4527, 39 06 5908 4409,
   FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 06 5908 4409,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2847/12.
